name: ElectrifyHome
0:
”Alexa, ask Electrify Home to check the status of the home station”
”Alexa, ask Electrify Home to start a charging session”
”Alexa, ask Electrify Home to stop a charging session”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: electrify home
des:
Now charging your electric vehicle at home is easier than ever with Electrify Home. 

Electrify Home’s Alexa skill allows you to:
● start or stop a charging session for your electric vehicle
● get details on your last charge session (date, time, and kWh delivered)
● check the status of your HomeStation charger to see if it’s ready to charge

This skill easily integrates with your Electrify America app and with Alexa to enhance your at-home EV charging experience. 

Please note that your HomeStation Charger will need to be connected to a power source and to Wi-Fi, linked with the Electrify America app, and in “Remote Start” mode for Alexa to be able to start or stop a charge session.
